SEARCH
Package boundary

Class BaseMenu

java.lang.Object
boundary.BaseMenu
Direct Known Subclasses:
CareerCenterStaffMenu, CompanyRepresentativeMenu, StudentMenu
public abstract class BaseMenu extends Object
Base Menu - Abstract base class for all user-specific menus Provides common functionality and interface

It includes shared utilities such as input handling, password management, user information display, and logout process.
